identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a high-density, precision-engineered CI/CD dashboard that feels like a cockpit for DevOps engineers.

layout_strategy.dashboard: Bento Grid Mode B (High Density). Use grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4. Gap-4.
layout_strategy.pipeline_list: Table view with status badges, mini-sparklines for history, and quick actions.
layout_strategy.pipeline_detail: Header with status summary -> Horizontal DAG (Directed Acyclic Graph) -> Tabs (Jobs, Tests, Artifacts, Logs).
layout_strategy.logs: Full-width terminal view. Monospace. Virtualized list for performance. High contrast text.
layout_strategy.spacing: Generous padding inside containers (p-6), tight gaps between related data points (gap-2).

components.buttons: Sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-md). Primary: White text on Dark Grey. Secondary: Ghost or Outline.
components.cards: Flat, border-only (border-border). No shadow by default. Hover: border-zinc-600.
components.badges: Pill-shaped. Solid colors for status (Green for Success, Red for Fail).
components.inputs: Flat, dark background (bg-zinc-900), border-zinc-800. Focus: ring-2 ring-indigo-500.
components.navigation: Sidebar navigation. Collapsible. Icons + Text. Active state: bg-zinc-800 text-white border-r-2 border-indigo-500.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a 'Dark Mode First' approach. The app should default to dark mode.
Use 'IBM Plex Sans' for all headings to give a technical, dashboard feel.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all logs, commit hashes, and code snippets.
For the Pipeline Graph: Create a horizontal scrollable container. Use flexbox with connecting lines (SVG or CSS borders) to show the flow Stages -> Jobs.
For Logs: Implement a search bar that highlights matching text. Use a dark terminal background (#0D0D0D).
Dashboard Widgets: Create 'Pipeline Health', 'Build Duration Trends', and 'Recent Failures' widgets.
Use Shadcn UI components but override the default radius to '0.5rem' and borders to 'zinc-800'.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid dark colors with subtle borders.
Status Colors: Success = Emerald-500, Failure = Red-500, Running = Indigo-500, Pending = Zinc-500.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers only.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
